question: Bhagjan Oil Well, that was seen in news, is located in which state?
explanation:
The Baghjan Oil Well of Oil India Limited (OIL) is located in Eastern Assamâ€™s Tinsukia district has been put off.
A massive fire occurred in the Oil well due to equipment failure and it turned out into a blowout, which means uncontrolled escape of gas at great speed. Oil India Limited (OIL) and foreign experts managed to tame the fire after 110 days.
